title: Pecos Bill Rides a Tornado
subtle: Tall Tale (fiction), 877 words, Level O (Grade 2), Lexile 600L
description: In this tall tale, readers learn all about an American hero. Pecos Bill was an extremely strong boy who was accidentally separated from his parents at a young age. He was found and raised by coyotes in the wild, where he lived for fifteen years. Eventually, a cowboy found him and brought him to civilization, where Bill outsmarted outlaws from the Wild West and tamed the wildest of horses. But that was nothing compared to the adventure during which he lassoed a twisting tornado and rode it like a wild bronco!
meta: bronco, bucked, dreaded, embers, lasso, outlaws, pioneer, romped, tyke
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Reality and Fantasy : Distinguish between reality and fantasy
Long Vowels : Identify and discriminate the long /o/ vowel sound
Compound Words : Identify and create compound words
